name: Pocket Koi
description:
You have fish and now you want to play with them in the pond.

But, everything changed when the red fishes attacked. 
Control your fish to dodge every redfish. Play in different modes with different fish to unlock. Collect all the fishes and play with them in the unpredictable pond of color.

Features.

  • Pond : for fishes that the player collected
  • 10 fishes to be collected
  • Quest : random task for reward
  • Skills : shield, speed up, slow down, granats
  • 3 Modes : Catch, Survival, Capture
  • Store : to buy powerup, foods, and diamond
  • Daily reward
